channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Forty Grand Fadeout
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Benton Braden)
item.description: Snatch artists were so clever they had a bank sewed up to safely pass ransom thousands. And G-man Jim Forde stuck his neck out so far that he was left to rot in a treasure trap.
